data.text: Atĩrĩrĩ, Beli nĩĩinamĩrĩire, nayo Nebo ĩkahocerera;
Nyamũ icio na ngai icio cia kũhooywo irainamĩrĩra hamwe;
“Atĩrĩrĩ, ta thikĩrĩriai, inyuĩ nyũmba ya Jakubu,
O na ũkũrũ-inĩ wanyu, no niĩ,
“Niĩ-rĩ, mũngĩngerekania na ũ kana nũũ mũngĩnjiganania nake?
Andũ amwe maitũrũraga thahabu kuuma mondo-inĩ ciao,
Mũhianano ũcio maũigagĩrĩra ciande ciao, makaũkuua;
Ririkanai maũndũ marĩa mahĩtũkĩte, marĩa ma tene;
Niĩ menyithanagia maũndũ marĩa mageekĩka marigĩrĩrio-inĩ kuuma o kĩambĩrĩria,
Nĩngeeta nyoni ndĩa nyama kuuma mwena wa irathĩro;
Ta thikĩrĩriai, inyuĩ andũ a ngoro nyũmũ,
